io.orchestrate.client
Interface OrchestrateFuture<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the future result.
All Superinterfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Future<T>
public interface OrchestrateFuture<T>
extends java.util.concurrent.Future<T>

A listenable future, based on Future.

Method Summary

Method Detail

getOperation

io.orchestrate.client.AbstractOperation<T> getOperation()
Return the operation for this future.

Returns:
The operation for this future.

addListener

void addListener(OrchestrateFutureListener<T> listener)
Add the specified listener to this future.

The listener is notified when this future Future.isDone(). If the future is already completed, the listener is notified immediately.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to notify when this future completes.

removeListener

void removeListener(OrchestrateFutureListener<T> listener)
Remove the specified listener from this future.

The listener is no longer notified when this future Future.isDone(). If the listener is not associated with this future, this method does nothing and returns silently.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to remove from this future.
